original_title: Hoji: The Story of Eric Hjorleifson
overview: Shot-for-shot this film features the best skiing ever shown in one movie. Sit back and live vicariously through the life of Eric Hjorleifson.
tagline: Eric Hjorleifson lets his skiing speak for itself. He doesnâ€™t stand on the bar and shout out his accolades. He skis for brands that give him 100% creative control over the equipment that he designs and uses. He chases storms. He ditches his cell phone for weeks at a time.
title: Hoji: The Story of Eric Hjorleifson
